charges.charge_description: 21:963 (b)(1)(B)(ii); 18:3551 et seq.___deft. did knowingly and intentionally conspire to import into US from a place outside cocaine (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant assessed $50.00. Defendant fined $2,000.00; sentenced to 1 day of imprisonment, followed by 5 years of supervised release. Defendant to surrender to the U.S. Marshal for this District at 10:00 a.m. on 11/30/95 (until 5:00 p.m). Defendant shall not possess a firearm as denfined in 18:921. Schedule of Payment attached along with Statement of reasons. (1)
